item.description:
Hi, all:

I'm creating an official Meetup calendar for the retreat simply so that there's a mailing list associated with this event, which actually runs Thursday night-Sunday noon in Madison, CT. I know that not everyone visits the Web site every day, so this way, if there's an important update about the retreat, we can e-mail all of you at once.

I've already RSVP'd for everyone who's paid a deposit to attend as well as for the two day guests I know we're expecting.

For those of you listed as "yes" RSVPs, keep in mind that--in this case--simply changing your RSVP to "no" won't be enough to cancel your participation in this event. The cancellation policy cited in the retreat discussion threads on the Message Board remains in effect.

Again, I just created this calendar item so we'd have a mailing list. All the retreat discussion should continue on the Message Board. Thanks!

Anne

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: September Weekend Retreat in Madison, CT
